trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref uid="langword_csharp_caching" name="caching" href=""></xref> group within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Configura o <xref uid="langword_csharp_caching" name="caching" href=""> </xref> grupo dentro de um arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The SystemWebCachingSectionGroup class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `caching` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A classe SystemWebCachingSectionGroup fornece uma maneira de acessar e modificar programaticamente o `caching` seção de um arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The SystemWebCachingSectionGroup class and the `caching` section provide centralized control of the caching mechanism for a site or application.
trans-unit.target: A classe SystemWebCachingSectionGroup e o `caching` seção fornece controle centralizado do mecanismo de cache para um site ou aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible for caching to be deployed, modified, and disabled without modifying individual pages in the application.
trans-unit.target: Isso torna possível para o cache para ser implantado, modificado e desabilitado sem modificar páginas individuais no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET caching mechanism is implemented by the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> class.
trans-unit.target: O mecanismo de cache do ASP.NET é implementado pela <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>classe.</xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Caching Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) The following list describes the two types of caching ASP.NET provides.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [visão geral de cache ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) a lista a seguir descreve os dois tipos de cache ASP.NET fornece.

trans-unit.source: - The first is called output caching, which allows you to store dynamic page and user control responses.
trans-unit.target: -O primeiro é chamado de cache de saída, que permite que você armazene página dinâmica e respostas de controle de usuário.

trans-unit.source: On subsequent requests, the page or user control code is not executed; the cached output is used to satisfy the request.
trans-unit.target: Em solicitações subsequentes, o código de controle de página ou o usuário não seja executado; a saída do cache é usada para atender à solicitação.

trans-unit.source: You can access output caching settings using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCache%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCacheSettings%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as configurações de cache de saída usando o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCache%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCacheSettings%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCacheSettings%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The second type of caching is traditional application data caching, which you can use to programmatically store arbitrary objects to server memory so your application can save the time and resources it takes to recreate them.
trans-unit.target: -O segundo tipo de armazenamento em cache é um aplicativo tradicional cache de dados, que pode ser usado para armazenar programaticamente objetos arbitrários à memória do servidor para que seu aplicativo pode economizar o tempo e recursos que leva para recriá-los.

trans-unit.source: You can access these cache settings using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.Cache%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar essas configurações de cache usando o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.Cache%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.Cache%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The SystemWebCachingSectionGroup constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: O construtor SystemWebCachingSectionGroup não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado pelo sistema de configuração do ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Obter uma instância de <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup>classe usando o <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>método.</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_cache" name="cache" href=""></xref> section contained within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref uid="langword_csharp_cache" name="cache" href=""> </xref> seção contida dentro da configuração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection> object refers to the `cache` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection>objeto se refere a `cache` seção do arquivo de configuração.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection> class to modify the `cache` section programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection>classe para modificar o `cache` seção programaticamente.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_outputCache" name="outputCache" href=""></xref> section contained within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref uid="langword_csharp_outputCache" name="outputCache" href=""> </xref> seção contida dentro da configuração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection> object refers to the `outputCache` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection>objeto se refere a `outputCache` seção do arquivo de configuração.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_outputCacheSettings" name="outputCacheSettings" href=""></xref> section contained within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref uid="langword_csharp_outputCacheSettings" name="outputCacheSettings" href=""> </xref> seção contida dentro da configuração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> object refers to the `outputCacheSettings` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>objeto se refere a `outputCacheSettings` seção do arquivo de configuração.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>

trans-unit.source: The output cache settings enable or disable disk-based persistent output cache, define the location for persisting the data to be cached, and specify the maximum size of the cache per application.
trans-unit.target: As configurações de cache de saída habilitar ou desabilitar o cache de saída persistente baseada em disco, definem o local para persistir os dados sejam armazenados em cache e especifique o tamanho máximo do cache por aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET allows you to cache multiple versions of a page response declaratively by using attributes of the directive and programmatically using the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> class.
trans-unit.target: O ASP.NET permite armazenar em cache várias versões de uma resposta de página declarativamente usando atributos da diretiva e programaticamente usando as propriedades e métodos para a <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>classe.</xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>

trans-unit.source: You can achieve the same results by configuring the application using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> or the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> type.
trans-unit.target: Você pode obter os mesmos resultados por meio da configuração do aplicativo usando o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>ou o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>tipo.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_sqlCacheDependency" name="sqlCacheDependency" href=""></xref> section contained within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref uid="langword_csharp_sqlCacheDependency" name="sqlCacheDependency" href=""> </xref> seção contida dentro da configuração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection> object refers to the `sqlCacheDependency` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection>objeto se refere a `sqlCacheDependency` seção do arquivo de configuração.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection>

trans-unit.source: The SQL cache dependency establishes a relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table.
trans-unit.target: A dependência de cache SQL estabelece uma relação entre um item armazenado em cache de um aplicativo ASP.NET e uma tabela de banco de dados específica do SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> class must monitor the table so that when the table changes the item will be automatically removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency>classe deve monitorar a tabela para que quando a tabela altera o item será removido automaticamente do cache.</xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection"> </xref> objeto.
